**隐身斗篷**（cloak of invisibility）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是由[布](/index.php?title=%E5%B8%83\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "布 (page does not exist)")制成的[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")斗篷。未鉴定时，它的外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## 生成

非[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有约14.83%的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件隐身斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物的起始斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换为[长袍](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%8D "长袍")，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约为3.71%。[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")玩家怪物的起始斗篷有1⁄2的概率被替换为[魔法抵抗斗篷](/wiki/%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E6%8A%B5%E6%8A%97%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "魔法抵抗斗篷")，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约是7.42%[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 描述

隐身斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且能提供[MC1](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔 (page does not exist)")和[隐形](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%90%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "隐形 (page does not exist)")特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的隐形，穿戴或脱下隐身斗篷会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。

## 策略

- *主条目：[隐形](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%90%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "隐形 (page does not exist)")*

隐身斗篷通常是玩家能获得的首个隐形来源。如果你有其他永久隐形来源（例如[隐形魔杖](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%90%E5%BD%A2%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "隐形魔杖 (page does not exist)")），你可以换用更好的斗篷。

[幻影斗篷](/wiki/%E5%B9%BB%E5%BD%B1%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "幻影斗篷")赋予的[幻影](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%BB%E5%BD%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幻影 (page does not exist)")特质虽然不像隐形那样能降低敌人命中玩家的概率，但也有独特的优势：如果玩家有幻影特质，怪物只有1⁄4的概率发现玩家的真实位置，而如果玩家有隐形特质，怪物有1⁄3的概率发现玩家的位置。此外，游戏中有不少怪物拥有[看见隐形](/index.php?title=%E7%9C%8B%E8%A7%81%E9%9A%90%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "看见隐形 (page does not exist)")特质，隐形对它们完全无用，但没有怪物能够100%识破幻影，且只有速度足够快的怪物能够靠攻击来识破幻影。

在商店里穿戴未知的斗篷时要慎重——如果它是被诅咒的隐身斗篷，你会无法离开商店。

## 历史

隐身斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本，隐身斗篷能提供[MC2](/index.php?title=%E9%94%80%E9%AD%94%EF%BC%883.4.3%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "销魔（3.4.3） (page does not exist)")。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Cloak_of_invisibility/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the cloak of invisibility provides MC2 while worn.

Upgrading a cloak of invisibility has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak"), and upgrading an elven cloak or [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak") has a 1⁄4 chance of producing a cloak of invisibility.

A game that randomizes them to appear as an "opera cloak" will result in invisible [vampires](/wiki/Vampire_\(monster_class\) "Vampire (monster class)"), which are annoying if not more difficult to fight unless a character has see invisible.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), the cloak of invisibility confers 1 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR"), invisibility, and MC2 while worn. Male [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") [Anachrononauts](/wiki/Anachrononaut "Anachrononaut") start with a +0 cloak of invisibility.

Wizard driver [Amm Kamerel](/wiki/Amm_Kamerel "Amm Kamerel") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a cloak of invisibility.

One map of the [Grue's Cavern](/wiki/Grue%27s_Cavern "Grue's Cavern") has a treasure pile with a cursed -1 cloak of invisibility.

[The Veil of Latona](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Veil_of_Latona "DNetHack artifacts") is a [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") cloak of invisibility, and is the [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for neutral [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") that are [human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier_\(starting_race\) "Incantifier (starting race)") or [half-dragon](/wiki/Half-dragon_\(starting_race\) "Half-dragon (starting race)"). While carried, it grants [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"), and while worn it grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") and [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") in addition to invisibility.

[The Mantle of Heaven](/wiki/The_Mantle_of_Heaven "The Mantle of Heaven") and [The Vestment of Hell](/wiki/The_Vestment_of_Hell "The Vestment of Hell") are artifact cloaks that always have a specific randomized appearance, making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of invisibility.

A cloak of invisibility can be used to repair the active camoflauge system of [imperial elven body armor](/wiki/Imperial_elven_armor "Imperial elven armor"), conferring invisibility.

## 百科文本

Cloaks are the universal outer garb of everyone who is not a Barbarian. It is hard to see why. They are open in front and require you at most times to use one hand to hold them shut. On horseback they leave the shirt-sleeved arms and most of the torso exposed to wind and Weather. The OMTs \[ Official Management Terms ] for Cloaks well express their difficulties. They are constantly \_swirling and dripping\_ and becoming \_heavy with water\_ in rainy Weather, \_entangling with trees\_ or \_swords\_, or needing to be \_pulled close around her/his shivering body\_. This seems to suggest they are less than practical for anyone on an arduous Tour.

\[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ]

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 157](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L157)

隐身斗篷（cloak of invisibility）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它是由布制成的魔法斗篷。未鉴定时，它的外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略

    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack

生成

非僧侣职业的玩家怪物生成时有约14.83%的概率获得一件隐身斗篷[2][3]。牧师玩家怪物的起始斗篷有3⁄4的概率被替换为长袍，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约为3.71%。巫师玩家怪物的起始斗篷有1⁄2的概率被替换为魔法抵抗斗篷，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约是7.42%[4][5]。

描述

隐身斗篷的基础AC加成为1，且能提供MC1和隐形特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的隐形，穿戴或脱下隐身斗篷会自动鉴定之。

策略

主条目：隐形

隐身斗篷通常是玩家能获得的首个隐形来源。如果你有其他永久隐形来源（例如隐形魔杖），你可以换用更好的斗篷。

幻影斗篷赋予的幻影特质虽然不像隐形那样能降低敌人命中玩家的概率，但也有独特的优势：如果玩家有幻影特质，怪物只有1⁄4的概率发现玩家的真实位置，而如果玩家有隐形特质，怪物有1⁄3的概率发现玩家的位置。此外，游戏中有不少怪物拥有看见隐形特质，隐形对它们完全无用，但没有怪物能够100%识破幻影，且只有速度足够快的怪物能够靠攻击来识破幻影。

在商店里穿戴未知的斗篷时要慎重——如果它是被诅咒的隐身斗篷，你会无法离开商店。

历史

隐身斗篷最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本，隐身斗篷能提供MC2。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the cloak of invisibility provides MC2 while worn.

Upgrading a cloak of invisibility has a 1⁄2 chance of producing an elven cloak, and upgrading an elven cloak or oilskin cloak has a 1⁄4 chance of producing a cloak of invisibility.

A game that randomizes them to appear as an "opera cloak" will result in invisible vampires, which are annoying if not more difficult to fight unless a character has see invisible.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, the cloak of invisibility confers 1 AC, 0 DR, invisibility, and MC2 while worn. Male drow Anachrononauts start with a +0 cloak of invisibility.

Wizard driver Amm Kamerel have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a cloak of invisibility.

One map of the Grue's Cavern has a treasure pile with a cursed -1 cloak of invisibility.

The Veil of Latona is a neutral intelligent artifact cloak of invisibility, and is the crowning gift for neutral Rangers that are human, incantifier or half-dragon. While carried, it grants drain resistance, and while worn it grants magic resistance and reflection in addition to invisibility.

The Mantle of Heaven and The Vestment of Hell are artifact cloaks that always have a specific randomized appearance, making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of invisibility.

A cloak of invisibility can be used to repair the active camoflauge system of imperial elven body armor, conferring invisibility.

百科文本

Cloaks are the universal outer garb of everyone who is not a Barbarian. It is hard to see why. They are open in front and require you at most times to use one hand to hold them shut. On horseback they leave the shirt-sleeved arms and most of the torso exposed to wind and Weather. The OMTs [ Official Management Terms ] for Cloaks well express their difficulties. They are constantly _swirling and dripping_ and becoming _heavy with water_ in rainy Weather, _entangling with trees_ or _swords_, or needing to be _pulled close around her/his shivering body_. This seems to suggest they are less than practical for anyone on an arduous Tour.

[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ]

|cost=60 |weight=10 |material=布 }} '''隐身斗篷'''（cloak of invisibility）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[斗篷]]类[[防具]]。它是由[[布]]制成的[[魔法物品|魔法]]斗篷。未鉴定时，它的外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|468|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == 非[[僧侣（玩家怪物）|僧侣]]职业的[[玩家怪物]]生成时有约14.83%的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一件隐身斗篷{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|157|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|207|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[牧师（玩家怪物）|牧师]]玩家怪物的起始斗篷有{{frac|3|4}}的概率被替换为[[长袍]]，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约为3.71%。[[巫师（玩家怪物）|巫师]]玩家怪物的起始斗篷有{{frac|2}}的概率被替换为[[魔法抵抗斗篷]]，因此生成时持有隐身斗篷的概率约是7.42%{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|217|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|248|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 隐身斗篷的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，且能提供[[销魔|MC1]]和[[隐形]]特质。如果玩家没有其他来源的隐形，穿戴或脱下隐身斗篷会[[自动鉴定]]之。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|隐形}} 隐身斗篷通常是玩家能获得的首个隐形来源。如果你有其他永久隐形来源（例如[[隐形魔杖]]），你可以换用更好的斗篷。 [[幻影斗篷]]赋予的[[幻影]]特质虽然不像隐形那样能降低敌人命中玩家的概率，但也有独特的优势：如果玩家有幻影特质，怪物只有{{frac|4}}的概率发现玩家的真实位置，而如果玩家有隐形特质，怪物有{{frac|3}}的概率发现玩家的位置。此外，游戏中有不少怪物拥有[[看见隐形]]特质，隐形对它们完全无用，但没有怪物能够100%识破幻影，且只有速度足够快的怪物能够靠攻击来识破幻影。 在商店里穿戴未知的斗篷时要慎重——如果它是被诅咒的隐身斗篷，你会无法离开商店。 == 历史 == 隐身斗篷最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。在[[NetHack 3.4.3]]及更早版本，隐身斗篷能提供[[销魔（3.4.3）|MC2]]。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], the cloak of invisibility provides MC2 while worn. Upgrading a cloak of invisibility has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing an [[elven cloak]], and upgrading an elven cloak or [[oilskin cloak]] has a {{frac|4}} chance of producing a cloak of invisibility. A game that randomizes them to appear as an "opera cloak" will result in invisible [[Vampire (monster class)|vampires]], which are annoying if not more difficult to fight unless a character has see invisible. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], the cloak of invisibility confers 1 AC, 0 [[DR]], invisibility, and MC2 while worn. Male [[Drow (starting race)|drow]] [[Anachrononaut]]s start with a +0 cloak of invisibility. Wizard driver [[Amm Kamerel]] have a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a cloak of invisibility. One map of the [[Grue's Cavern]] has a treasure pile with a cursed -1 cloak of invisibility. [[dNetHack artifacts#The Veil of Latona|The Veil of Latona]] is a [[neutral]] [[Intelligent artifact|intelligent]] [[artifact]] cloak of invisibility, and is the [[crowning]] gift for neutral [[Ranger]]s that are [[Human (starting race)|human]], [[Incantifier (starting race)|incantifier]] or [[Half-dragon (starting race)|half-dragon]]. While carried, it grants [[drain resistance]], and while worn it grants [[magic resistance]] and [[reflection]] in addition to invisibility. [[The Mantle of Heaven]] and [[The Vestment of Hell]] are artifact cloaks that always have a specific randomized appearance, making it possible for one of them to be a cloak of invisibility. A cloak of invisibility can be used to repair the active camoflauge system of [[Imperial elven armor|imperial elven body armor]], conferring invisibility. == 百科文本 == {{encyclopedia| Cloaks are the universal outer garb of everyone who is not a Barbarian. It is hard to see why. They are open in front and require you at most times to use one hand to hold them shut. On horseback they leave the shirt-sleeved arms and most of the torso exposed to wind and Weather. The OMTs [ Official Management Terms ] for Cloaks well express their difficulties. They are constantly _swirling and dripping_ and becoming _heavy with water_ in rainy Weather, _entangling with trees_ or _swords_, or needing to be _pulled close around her/his shivering body_. This seems to suggest they are less than practical for anyone on an arduous Tour. |[ The Tough Guide to Fantasyland, by Diana Wynne Jones ] }} == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Cloaks/zh-CN|YINSHENDOUPENG]]
